biotools.summary: Clustering algorithm designed for the identification of global homologs. It employs an iterative approach to clustering sequences. However, rather than using a single HMM or profile to expand the cluster, this tool identifies subfamilies using the SCI-PHY algorithm and then selects and aligns new homologs using subfamily hidden Markov models. It is shown to outperform BLAST, PSI-BLAST and the UCSC SAM-Target 2K methods.
